item.title: A quick notes on how to use Hugo to do personal publication
item.description: Hugo related Hugo Home Hugo directory structures Hugo Themes related https://themes.gohugo.io/monopriv/ https://themes.gohugo.io/hyde-hyde/ hyde-hyde options https://petercheng.net/posts/website-v2-setup/ https://github.com/htr3n/hyde-hyde/blob/master/exampleSite/config.toml static sites hosting: surge.sh netlify static sites hosting reference: https://superdevresources.com/host-static-website-free/ https://www.slant.co/topics/2256/~best-static-website-hosting-provider Work with git submodule git submodule tutorials TODO customize the blog. (layout/color/Portfolio) publish to gitlab. study how to publish to surge.sh and netlify study Front Matter

item.title: The first post in this blog
item.description: This is my new blog hosting on github pages with Hugo, I will write my notes mostly in technical area and sometimes in other area such as thoughts, stories, ideas and life Hope this may help myself and others.
